#summary About background color

= Background Color =

The background color is the one used to draw with the right mouse button. You can change this color pressing `Alt+Right click` or using the Eyedropper tool (`I key`) and doing a `Right click`.

The background color is used in operation like [CutCopyPaste Cut] or [Clear Clear] to erase the [BackgroundLayer Background layer] in the [Selection selected region].
